article: Once there was a famous captain. He was very  _  at sailing . The bad weather or the pirates  _  beat him. His men and other captains thought he was very  _  . However, there was something  _  about this captain. Every morning he would lock himself in the  bedroom  and open a small safe . In the safe there was an envelope  _  a piece of paper inside. He would look at the paper for a minute, and then go to his workplace. This  went on  for years. Everyone wanted to  _  what he usually did in his bedroom. One day the captain died. After his burial , his men ran into the captain's bedroom. One of them  _  the safe, got the envelope, and read the paper. What was on the paper? Only four  _  were on the paper, "Port Left; Starboard Right."
